title: Shortcut Love
original_name: ショートカット・ラブ!!
sinopse: Akino's been in the advertising world for a while, and has been successful. But when younger man Kurata is chosen to team up with him on a project, he wishes it was anyone else. Kurata is always challenging Akino and criticizing his ideas. Why is Kurata so hard on Akino? (Source: M-U)
